text:
@WhiteHouse And the death toll is rising accordingly 120,000+ and the number of cases increase daily, now 2,250,000+. It's all on you and your complete Failure to handle the Covid19 pandemic response. America is #1 in the world for #s of deaths and cases. 😢 Happy with it?

@realDonaldTrump
